tasks.title: Create USAGE.html - Comprehensive Usage Guide
tasks.description: Create a single HTML file covering installation, all CLI commands, common workflows, troubleshooting, and next steps
tasks.details: Include: npm/npx install, kickoff create/list/stacks/docs/config commands with examples, SaaS/AI/Python/Go workflows, troubleshooting (port conflicts, node version, template errors, git issues), env vars reference

tasks.title: Create comprehensive STACKS.html with ALL options
tasks.description: Create single HTML file with every stack option from types.ts - project types, databases, ORMs, auth, runtimes, AI frameworks, vector DBs, embeddings, local AI, web servers, and presets
tasks.details: Include: 18 project types, 18 databases, 12 ORMs, 12 auth providers, 6 runtimes, 7 AI frameworks, 9 vector DBs, 9 embedding providers, 11 local AI providers, 4 web servers, 14 presets. Each with name, description, use cases, env vars, costs, compatibility

tasks.title: Delete redundant documentation files
tasks.description: Remove QUICK_START.html, PRESETS.html, QUESTIONNAIRE.md as they are merged into the new files

tasks.title: Update CLI to point to new documentation files
tasks.description: Update cli.ts: kickoff docs opens USAGE.html, kickoff stacks opens STACKS.html, remove kickoff presets command
tasks.details: Modify src/cli.ts to update file paths and remove presets command

tasks.title: Add vitest.config.ts
tasks.description: Create vitest configuration file with TypeScript support, coverage config, and proper include/exclude patterns
tasks.details: Configure vitest for ESM, TypeScript, v8 coverage

tasks.title: Final build and verification
tasks.description: Run build, tests, verify CLI commands, test HTML files open correctly
tasks.details: npm run build, npm test, test all kickoff commands, verify HTML opens
